categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Senu was a Zabrak male Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire during the Cold War. His fortress was attacked by Darth Ikoral and an army of savage, pureblood Sith. A target for the army's xenophobic crusade, Senu was unable to stop the renegade Sith Lord and was thus killed in the attack.
